attributes.background: Our country was once a safe haven, all we see is people telling us we cant put our flags up  and we are not to wear crosses at work. We are squeezed to the point we cant even afford to live. We should fix the damage done to our own so we will then be able to help others. Charity starts at home.

rejection.details:
Duplicate petition

We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107142

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
